title: Black
description: A Second Chance For Love And Revenge…When Byron Black returns to London for his sister’s wedding, he bumps into a gorgeous redhead determined to steal a dance. Holly Summers was just the skinny little girl from across the hall, but now she’s London’s hottest political advisor, in more ways than one.Black and Holly swear they’re just friends, but friends don’t usually tear one another’s clothes off. They’ve got to keep it professional, because Holly’s campaign is being targeted by a mad bomber, and Black sees frightening similarities to an old case that blew up in his face. It’s the worst possible time to fall in love. Black’s feelings for Holly will make her the next target of this old enemy back from the dead, and bent on revenge.“Black” is an explosive, heart-pounding, sheet-soaking romantic thriller, Book 6 in the Colors of Crime series. It’s a standalone novel complete with HEA, and no cliff-hangers. Only for mature readers who love steamy hookups with a side of danger.
author: Sophie Lark
